Package pkgMain

Class GardenScreen

java.lang.Object
pkgMain.GardenScreen
public class GardenScreen
extends java.lang.Object
GardenScreen class. Handles formatting of Garden Screen. Sources image file paths.
Author:
Aidan Chao, Nicholas Cutrona, Caleb Davis, Joey Loporto, Tommy Cheung

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    • createScreen

      public void createScreen​(java.lang.String sun, java.lang.String soil, java.lang.String moisture, int budgetNeeded)
      Formatting for how GardenScreen is displayed. Sets styling, padding etc for Panes, Tiles. Sets Conditions text. options button.
      Parameters:
      sun - String current sun condition
      soil - String current soil condition
      moisture - String current moisture condition
      budgetNeeded - int budget needed
